plot: In the near future and with the help of cloning, people learn how to use more than 15% of their brain capacity, the more capacity they can use the more super physical powers they can attain...
title: Just Like You Imagined
plot_es: In the near future and with the help of cloning, people learn how to use more than 15% of their brain capacity, the more capacity they can use the more super physical powers they can attain...
